name: The epic quest for becoming a web dev
name_original: The epic quest for becoming a web dev
description:
Do you find yourself stuck on the road to become a successful web developer?

Despair no more !
With the latest educational piece of software by consumer hard products INC.
You can also craft the definitive CV and land yourself a job !

Disclaimer:
Don't actually follow anything of what is said inside this piece of software
Not financial advice. >:-)
